paragraph.paragraph:
You can easily add items that are common to EiffelEnvision projects using the Add New Item command. When you use the Add New Item command, the vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox 0 Add New Item dialog box appears with a list of item templates, which add the appropriate files to your project.
Note: The list of item templates that appear in the vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox 0 Add New Item dialog box vary, depending on the type of project you are working with.

The following table shows a list of EiffelEnvision Add New Item templates.
600 6 Project Items
Template Description Category
Custom Control Adds a class for creating a user-drawn Windows Form control. UI
EiffelVision 2 Dialog Adds an EiffelVision 2 dialog for Eiffel Windows applications to your project. UI
EiffelVision 2 Window Adds an EiffelVision 2 window for Eiffel Windows applications to your project. UI
User Control Adds a class for creating a Windows Form control using the visual designer. UI
Windows Form Adds a form for Windows applications to your project. UI
 
Class Adds an empty class declaration. Code
Component Class Adds a class for creating components using the visual designer. Code
Installer Class Adds a class to be invoked at set-up time. Code
Web Service Class Adds a class for creating Web Services to use from other applications. Code
Windows Service Adds a class for creating Windows services. Code
 
Text File Adds a blank text file. Data
XML File Adds a blank .xml file. Data
XSLT File Adds a file used to transform XML documents. Data
 
Application Configuration File Adds a .config file that you can use to configure your application settings. Resources
Assembly Resource File Adds a .NET resource file. Resources
Bitmap Adds a Win32 bitmap file. Resources
Cursor Adds a Win32 cursor file. Resources
Icon
Resources
